reviewText: I found the acting to be superb!  Story line addresses a parent's worst nightmare. But even at the worst times in our lives, hope still lives on.
Get out the Kleenx!!!  You could tell that it was a low budget production but the plot of the story was worth the time to see it.  Loved it.

It is a very heart moving story about a young girl and how she helps save another child. Although the Christian principles are not accurate about angels, it is still a very moving story that is sure to touch your heart.
awesome!
Maybe there was a good story line although the acting is horrible. Too overdramatic for me.

If you've ever experienced God's love and angels like I have, then you will understand the message of love and hope shown in this movie. All you have to do is open your heart and accept it. If you have an open heart, you will love this movie. If you don't, you probably will not like it and will fight its message of hope and love. As Steve Perry and Kenny Loggins once wrote, "Don't fight it, it'll do your heart so good." With an open heart, this movie will definitely warm it. And, what is wrong with that?

A tender story about hope, faith & Love.  In  this world of brutality & hate;; it was a pleasure to watch this movie that pulled on my hearts strings & rremined that God does exist.  Through Him we can conquer our greatest loses and make a way in this way to heal all the hate & discord we face today.  Kari Hawker is a remarkable young actress, we hope to see her in more films; she is effortless in her part & draws you in to believe.

A story about the transitions of spiritual experience parents ( mother a Homeless Shelter volunteer-husband a Policeman) have concerning their child/miracle (Elizabeth), whom the LORD had taken back home/heaven.  After each episode, the spirited  being leaves a white stem petal behind. With determination and prayer the couple saves a street child-(MaryJean  alias Pumpkin from a bad experience.  Since loosing their little girl, they decide to form a Foundation for honoring Elizabeth inlieu of the street children.
give me my two hours of life back instead of watching this pablum.

I appreciate the efforts to promote Christian values; however the bible is very clear that the dead know not anything, until the resurrection.  In the strongest terms the bible forbids any attempt to communicate with the dead.  The reason is because any attempt to do so puts us in direct contact with the Prince of the air who since the Garden of Eden has been lying to us, saying there is no death.

Excellent movie.  A little girl dies from unknown heart condition.  Father, policeman, suggests mother do some volunteer work to help herself mentally.  Her dead daughter's spirit with rose petal leads her to a little girl living on street who had witnessed her mother being shot to death. This little girl is adopted by them. Film deals with crime, kidnapping of child, etc so there is plenty of story.  It is a movie that can be watched by entire family. It would help to have Kleenex nearby as it is very emotional.
I read about it in a catalog and I had to order it to watch sounded like a great movie so will let you know how it turns out . Sounds sad and great at the same time.

I bought this movie because I really loved Kari Hawker in Christmas Angel. Kari seems to have the ability to act without effort and in my opinion was perfect for the role. Elizabeth's Gift is a very touching movie about a couple that lost their child due to a heart condition they were unaware their daughter had. The story tells the story of the parents plight to regain their happiness through love and a miracle, Elizabeth's Gift to them. I would recommend to anyone that loves movies that touch their hearts and has a real meaning in life. Since I loved Kari's performance in Christmas Angle and the price was right for this movie, I had no choice but to buy it. Glad I did.
This DVD was great.  I enjoyed watching every minute of it.  It makes you wonder whether there really is life after death.
This is a fine film with great values and excellent messages.  Very interesting and well done.  Thank you for the recommendation.

I hate it when movie plots enhance the suspense through stupidity. This movie was guilty of that. The fact that it features a new age concept of a child coming back to Earth was a big turn off as well. The movie just seemed out of sync to me most of the way through. It has some moments of suspense but they felt awkward. Fake violence is really hard to make convincing. This movie failed at it. I loved the crazy guy who thought the mother was an angel sent from General Patton. And I loved her performance. But all in all, this was just an average movie for me.
The children were wonderful but the movie was not realistic.  The author needs to check laws to keep a movie factual.
This is a must see.. Great job to Rob Diamond I can't wait to see more movies from him. Next one to get is Saint Street

Excellent movie that will instill and enhance ones wholesome life values.  Experiencing this story was a blessing to me and family.  Highly recommend this to all.  Acting was excellent making making all the characters very believable.  This is a five star plus movie for people who have a heart and wish the goodness of love, truth and the strength to withstand life's tragedies.  A warm thank you to the creators of this film. God bless you all.

Typical B-Rated movie. Not believable due to things like the little homeless girl calling her new parents mom and dad way too soon in the relationship or the fundraiser bringing in $100,000  when there are barely any participants at the event. Most of the acting was poor which made it difficult to get "lost in the story."  I do believe in angels and spirits, but the acting just kept reminding me that it wasn't real. Very distracting.
Great movie
Thoroughly enjoyed this moving. Very engaging, excellent storyline.

Elizabeth's Gift is a poorly made movie.  There are many holes in the filming.  Much of the acting is poor quality.  Unfortunately, this story could have been way better made into a film.  However, the film here was like a home movie or worse  and not a real movie.  Very poorly executed.  It is a heart warming show and very sad.  Not believable at all.  Parts are totally brutal and filled with hatred.  Not what we would consider a Christian or family movie.
  It is ok, but not recommended.  Did not like this movie.  Spend your two hours watching a better movie.  A TIME FOR HEAVEN is much better.

Obviously not a Hollywood type budget here and you can figure out the movie quickly how it is going to end but so what? still a great a movie, I put it on because I had to work late... Needed background Noise, The movie was good enough that kept me watching the entire time and did none of my work! ha!

Yep, I cried, So it did its job.
